amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provisions creating a new private right of action against credit rating agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-370 to strike provisions which create a new private right of action against credit rating agencies; the amendment contains enforcement of credit rating agencies to the SEC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 257 (Roll no. 954).
